
{{Server event}}
This event is triggered when a player has been muted by [[/setPlayerMuted.md|setPlayerMuted]].

==Parameters==
''none''

==Source==
The source of this event is the player who got muted.

==Cancel effect==
If this event is [[/Event_system#Canceling.md|canceled]], the player will not be muted.

==Example== 
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
function muted()
    outputChatBox(getPlayerName(source) .. " has been muted.", root, 255, 0, 0)
end
addEventHandler("onPlayerMute", root, muted)
</syntaxhighlight>
